summary: M\'aiq the Liar is now quoted on some of your loading screens -- for all the lovers out there.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces occasional loading screen text with a quote from M\'aiq the Liar. W\'ont break anything and very good for those out there who have seen every loading screen thousands of times and are fans of M\'aiq the Liar. Enjoy


Also added second file with some misleading loading screen\'s for your enjoyment. however it is late and i am not at my funniest at this time of night. if any of you have some really good ideas for lies PM me please and i shall include them and you will be credited. thank you very much.
author: Dan L33

files.name: Now with my lies as well
